text: The 2002–03 Israeli Noar Leumit League was the 9th season since its introduction in 1994 as the top-tier football in Israel for teenagers between the ages 18–20. Maccabi Haifa won the title, whilst Hapoel Petah Tikva and Ironi Nir Ramat HaSharon were relegated. ==Final table== ==External links== *Noar Premier League 02-03 One.co.il Category:Israeli Noar Premier League seasons Youth
title: 2002–03 Israeli Noar Leumit League
